description: We provide accurate live exchange rates between USD and CNY. You can also view historical exchange rate charts for USD to CNY on the XTransfer website.
title: Currency Converter | Convert USD to CNY - XTransfer
introduction: XTransfer is an all-in-one business account that covers 15+ currencies and 200+ countries/regions. It allows users to create and maintain their accounts, hold multiple currencies, add/receive money, and transfer funds securely and cost-effectively to global suppliers. XTransfer offers competitive exchange rates to help users save up to 20% in currency exchange. Join over 450,000 business users today and start your XTransfer journey!
features: Hold 15+ currencies including USD, EUR, CNY, HKD, GBP, IDR, NGN, and more
Add money from bank accounts in various currencies
Receive money from another XTransfer account or bank accounts in 200+ countries/regions
Transfer funds to global suppliers securely and cost-effectively
Competitive exchange rates to save up to 20% in currency exchange
